text: @GovernorsOffice @GovernorTomWolf I appreciate the incredible gravity of forethought it takes to make Informed, Difficult decisions for the greater good. Keep at it Governor! It take a village to raise a child - IT TAKES EVERYONE TO DO THEIR PART TO STAMP OUT THIS COVID19 ENEMY- WEAR A MASK!
